Dear ,

Thank you for attending the 19th Qualys Security Conference and the Analyst & Investor Luncheon.


If you missed or want to revisit any part of the conference, see:

  • Analyst & Investor Luncheon livestream
  • QSC19 conference sessions and slides

QSC is one of our most important events, and we strive to improve your experience each year. Please let us know if you have any suggestions for the conference and which sessions you found most interesting.


Thank you again for your participation and for supporting Qualys over the years. I look forward to seeing you again next year at QSC20, November 16-19, 2020 at Bellagio Las Vegas.


Sincerely,

Philippe Courtot
Chairman & CEO, Qualys
